tool_description: Analyzes hashtag usage patterns, frequency, and performance metrics across social media content to identify trending and high-performing hashtags.

hashtags.description: Array of hashtags to analyze (with or without # symbol)

post_data.description: Array of post content to analyze for hashtag performance

engagement_scores.description: Array of engagement scores corresponding to each post

time_window_hours.description: Time window in hours for trend analysis (1-168)

min_frequency.description: Minimum frequency threshold for hashtag inclusion (1-100)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: post_data and engagement_scores arrays must have the same length
Empty hashtags array: At least one hashtag must be provided
Time window out of range: time_window_hours must be between 1 and 168 (one week)
Invalid frequency threshold: min_frequency must be between 1 and 100
Too many posts: Maximum 10000 posts allowed per analysis
Invalid engagement scores: All engagement scores must be non-negative numbers
usage: Provide hashtags to analyze, corresponding post data, and engagement scores. Optionally set time window and minimum frequency threshold. Returns performance metrics for each hashtag.

hashtag_frequencies.description: Array of usage frequencies for each hashtag

average_engagement.description: Array of average engagement scores for posts containing each hashtag

trending_score.description: Array of trending scores (0-100) for each hashtag

performance_ranking.description: Array of performance rankings (1 being best) for each hashtag
